bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chuan shi 傳屍 , corpse [evil] transmission. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry huang qi 黃芪：治血及煩悶熱毒，骨蒸勞 , “It cures [ailments associated with] blood as well as vexation and heart-pressure associated with heat poison, and also exhaustion because of bone steaming ”. Gu zhu 蠱疰 , gu -attachment-illness [11]

Etiological Agent. Pathological Condition identical with gu du 蠱毒 , gu poison . Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry wei mao 衛茅：除邪， 殺鬼毒蠱疰 , “It eliminates evil. It kills gu poison and gu -attachment-illness ”. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 17 ：治鬼疰、蠱疰，毒氣變化無常方 , “Recipe to cure abnormal changes resulting from poison qi such as demon attachment-illness and gu -attachment-illness ”. Gu zui 穀嘴 , grain mouth [1]

Pathological Condition identical with mian pao 面皰 , facial blister. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥： ( 面）皰是風熱，即穀嘴 , “[Facial] blisters are [a sign of] wind heat; this is [the so-called] grain mouth ”.
